channel.title: Michael W. Smith on UESI SongBook
channel.description: Recent content in Michael W. Smith on UESI SongBook

item.title: You Are Holy / Prince Of Peace
item.description: You are holy (You are holy) You are mighty (You are mighty) You are worthy (You are worthy) Worthy of praise (worthy of praise) I will follow (I will follow) I will listen (I will listen) I will love You (I will love You) All of my days (all of my days) I will sing to, and worship The King who is worthy I will love and adore Him And I will bow down before Him
